programme.title: HORA INFANTIL
programme.desc: Una selección de las mejores series chinas de dibujos animados, dobladas al español. Hora Infantil es una ventana a través de la cual los niños y adolescentes de los países de habla hispana pueden llegar a comprender mejor qué es y cómo es China.

programme.title: DÍALOGO
programme.desc: Convoca a celebridades, eruditos y funcionarios gubernamentales tanto de China como del exterior, para debatir temas de palpitante actualidad e interés general y de proyección internacional.

programme.title: DOCUMENTAL
programme.desc: Presentapersonajes y acontecimientos típicos, avances y descubrimientos tecnológicos y científicos, y la civilización social de China.

programme.title: EL PROYECTOR
programme.desc: Acérquese a la vida de la China antigua y moderna a través de las producciones dramáticas de CGTN-Español. La combinación perfecta de historia y ficción chinas en la pantalla de su televisor.

programme.title: What Could Be Bad: Episode 104 - An Ocean of Connection with Stephen Kellogg
Apex Fusion: Bridging the Blockchain Divide
programme.desc: Imagine a world where blockchains don’t speak different languages. Where Ethereum and Bitcoin don’t just coexist but they collaborate. In this episode we sit down with the visionary founders behind Apex Fusion, a bold layer1 project on a mission to unify the fractured blockchain universe. With a tri-chain architecture and a bridge that actually works, they are not just building tech - they are potentially laying down the infrastructure for the next evolution of web3.

programme.title: BULLISH CRYPTO REVERSAL COMING SOON XRP BTC ETH
programme.desc: Let's go ahead and talk about the potential bullish crypto reversal in progress! What do you think is going on?

programme.title: US ECONOMIC MELTDOWN PUMPING CRYPTO TO NEW HIGHS?!
programme.desc: The U.S. jobs report had a major affect on the markets this morning, but could bitcoin and crypto soar while everything else dumps?

programme.title: Navigating the Future of Finance: AI, Web3, and the Role of Stablecoins at Proof of Talk Paris 2025
programme.desc: Live from Proof of Talk Paris 2025, this episode of The Edge of Show explores the evolution of digital finance, security, and real-world blockchain utility with four visionary leaders shaping the next phase of Web3. First, we spoke with Stephan Lutz, CEO of BitMEX, who shared insights on exchange security, AI-assisted trading, and how BitMEX is navigating a more responsible approach to token listings and trader education. Next, we sat down with Nkiru Uwaje, CEO of Mansa, to learn how her team is powering cross-border payments with stablecoins and building liquidity rails for Africa, Southeast Asia, and Latin America. Then we spoke with Jason Jiang, Chief Business Officer at CertiK, who outlined how real-time monitoring and smarter compliance tools are transforming security in blockchain—and why regulators are finally catching up. Lastly, Damu Winston from Amazon Web3 joined us to discuss the convergence of Web3, AI, and spatial computing—plus a surprise appearance from his personal AI agent Samir, who gave us a glimpse into the not-so-distant future.

LIVE: Silverstone Festival of Speed
programme.desc: Experience the Silverstone Festival of Speed, where legendary cars, thrilling races, and live demonstrations celebrate the best of motorsport heritage and modern performance on an iconic track.

programme.title: Spring is in the Air
programme.desc: Spring is in the air with the perfect garments to add a little sunshine to your day. Sarah Gunn is first with a scalloped skirt. Then it’s lesson two with Angela Wolf, and adding the back flap to the bottom of the trench coat. The show closes with a cute and easy bunny bag for your favorite little child. Sew it up in a few minutes as an Easter bag to hold those colored eggs.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Old is New
programme.desc: Give a new twist to traditional art forms. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes a trinket box inspired by a popular video game. Then, she makes a friendly turtle using the ancient art of mosaic. Candie Cooper creates pop art with polka dots in the style of the artist Kusama, and Jenny coils a rag basket with a touch of denim.

programme.title: Too Nice to Stay Inside
programme.desc: Let's head outside for some fun. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes colorful hand grips for your bike. Katie Hacker has some fun with friendly bugs. Franz Spohn has sidewalk art tips and Katie makes special discovery eggs.

programme.title: On Your Wrist
programme.desc: This season we're exploring how to develop your sense of place and how it influences our design. One factor we haven't touched upon is designing with a strong focus on the end product and its use. Today is all about cuffs. They provide a different surface and a design aesthetic based on their shape. Leslie Rogalski is first with centerline cuffs with a Native American design. Then Candie Cooper uses leather for her cuff design. Finally, Tammy Honaman is back for another short lesson, featuring safety tips for working with enamel.

programme.title: Tool Workout
programme.desc: Add power to your design with new tool techniques. Host and designer Katie Hacker shows how she uses her favorite tools to make cold connections. Teacher Kate Richbourg gives her metalworking skills a work out with saws, shears and hammers. Then, she cools off with the right tools and techniques for professionally finishing metalwork jewelry.

programme.title: Episode 1: Shine It Up
programme.desc: Polish it and make it shine. Amy Tan makes pages gleam with foil and shares her favorite tape storage tip. Christine Drumheller adds bling and banners to her memory pages. Joe Rotella creates a shimmering lantern that lights up the nighttime.

programme.title: Episode 7: Cycles of Nature
programme.desc: Nature is a cycle of growth, and change. Host Julie Fei Fan Balzer begins with stenciled tiles that have infinite variations. Then Sandra Evertson has a box that mimics the effect of aging with a Verdigris finish. Aging happens to the best of us, so why not celebrate with a reusable birthday banner with Emily Thompson.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Little Lie
programme.desc: The past troubles Yussuf. His loyalty is put to the test. Iris extracts information about Children of the Jihad, while she and Haim try to identify their new leader. Talya wants Nimrode to come home. Uri shares the horrors of captivity with Nurit.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Jamal and Amiel's connection is revealed, as well as Amiel's transformation into Yussuf, who's struggling with the consequences of terrorism against Israel. Iris and Haim learn about Stockholm Syndrome. Yael's belongings are stolen from storage.

programme.title: A Ghost from the Past
programme.desc: Iris and Haim discover new details tying Amiel, Atar Shorer and Dr. Ze'ev together. Dr. Ze'ev is busy skillfully training Yinon. Nimrode's violent deterioration continues. An interested Dr. Ostrovsky offers a depressed Talia a ray of light.

programme.title: The Song
programme.desc: Atar recruits Yinon. Haim and Iris uncover Operation Judas. Nimrode spends an emotionally charged evening with Michaela. Talia meets a younger man. Abdullah and Yussuf prepare for a terrorist act, but Abdullah is skeptical of Yussuf's motivations.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 1
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. programme.title: FAN-FARE
programme.desc: Its a hot day and the one and only small table fan is the point of all attraction. Chai Raja deftly improvises for himself, but he is extremely concerned that none of his customers should have cause to complain. Sundar, himself too pouring from his pores, ignores his discomfort and sets about switching the blast of breeze (though its a rickety and extremely temperamental old fan) to keep the customers cool. But Basha wants his bit of breeze and is intent to steal the wind from Sundars sails! A tug-of-war for the fan ensues... Basha plays havoc sticking vadas under the fan for wheels and wheeling it off or by hoisting it up with a tricky fishing line. Sundar tries to keep the customers happy by using palm-leaf fans and fanning with all limbs possible...but the customers are too many. And Basha aggravates matters by using the fans breeze to spray paint Sundars body with fruit juice! Sundar chases Basha who smartly propels himself about with the fan, and even blows pillow fluff at Sundar to deter him from the chase. But the last proves to be a bad idea as the fluff sticks in the fan blades, damages it and the rusty things blows up! Scene cuts to show Sundar running behind Basha..but when camera pulls back we see that the two are on a kind of crude treadmill that powers a giant coconut frond wind-mill that lulls breeze at the tea-shop. Chai Raja grins and sloshes tea that forms a smiley with a wink at camera.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Grab a Crab
programme.desc: Once the crab is running from the eagle and enters in the GrandPAs courtyard where Keet helps him hide and they become good friends.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: WHATS IN A NAME
programme.desc: Sundar is trying to oust Basha as usual from the shop when he accidentally damages the signboard of the tea-shop. Moustache bristling, Chai Raja assigns Sundar the task of painting a new signboard for the tea shop but Basha is all set to botch it up. Each time Sundar paints on the hotels name, Basha streaks in wrecking havoc. he sometimes adds unnecessary caricatures of Chai Raja to the signboard, at yet others tweaks the spelling and even adjusts it so that it falls on a couple of unsuspecting customers causing Chai Rajas heart to palpitate. Sundar better pull up his paws and get on with the job for Chai Raja is as fond of his hotels exotic name as he is of serving up his exotic brews. FinallySundar loses and a mad chase and crash against the kitchen counter Sundar gulps sure that he is going to get the boot...but Chai Raja is grinning. The new signboard goes up and gets a big thumbs-up from everyone it spells the hotel name in tea-stains (with banana fritters and tea sieves interspersed). Sundar heaves a sigh of relief...for once!

programme.title: HYPNO-TACO
programme.desc: A new taco stand that has abruptly popped up overnight next to the tea shop. Strangely, though the tacos smell anything but tasty, the customers flock to it and Chai Raja sends Sundar to deal with matters. But that compounds the disaster as Sundar too turns his back at Chai Raja and starts guarding/waiting at the Taco stand with double his usual smartness! Though this gives Basha full freedom to raid the banana fries at the tea shop, Chai Rajas long face tugs at this heartstrings and Basha nips over to the taco stand to take a look at things. Thats when he realizes that the taco stand owner is in fact a rogue hypnotist from Bashas old circus who is literally hypnotizing the customers and Sundar to munch his Mexican lunch! Cracking his knuckles in glee, Basha sets about driving the rogue out of his mind and business. But a hypnotized Sunder is more powerful than ever, and Basha get whacked here and there in the ordeal. At last Basha gives a nice knock on Sundars head and he is back at the tea shop and Basha and Sundar together makes sure that the taco shop-owner runs for his dear life, much to Chai Rajas relief.

programme.title: Never Give Up - Odessa
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: BeAFriend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Dunky's Day in
programme.desc: Dunky has high fever and cannot tolerate any kind of noise. Cat has not had lunch as Dunky is sick… Keet fools him a lot by offering empty glasses for water..

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: APPLECART UPSET
programme.desc: The Fruit Ninjas, Mark Samurai, Durian grey and Sensei meet at DFS burger for a final showdown

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: Check Out Yuk
programme.desc: When Yuk accidentally gets stuck in a book and the book gets checked out of the library, he comes face to face with the dangers of being out in the real world.Will he survive all the twists and turns his journey takes him on? Will he ever make it back to the library in one piece? Will Icky and Yicky have to continue on as a duo? Watch the crazy shenanigans in the episode Yuk Checks Out!

programme.title: LOCKED UP
programme.desc: After his Mutant Octopus is defeated, Negu decides to attack the Guardians himself with a Mutant Meerkat. The Guardians capture him, and the Elders have Negu locked up near the Magic Fort. The Mutant Meerkat tunnels into the fort so Negu can steal the Glove of the North – his plan all along. The Guardians rush to stop him, but Negu ties them up with his Lasso of Doom – until Pai gnaws through it and temporarily EATS the Glove of the North!

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: Sideways Day
programme.desc: Odessa learns to accept Pancake’s idea over her own when she joins the Zoonicorns in Sideways Day.Accepting other’s ideas even if they’re different from your own.

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: Val the vampire
programme.desc: During Halloween the twins visit a young vampire who cannot manage being scary. They will realize this is only because she never cleans her vampire teeth!

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: King ragoo
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a golden marker and they find themselves in a place where all the kids have to obey a kid king’s orders.

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Is that dog trained?
programme.desc: Ragoo gets off the lead in a fantasy world and the twins have to train him.

programme.title: Cardboard Roll
programme.desc: Watch Hepi and Briko give toilet paper rolls a second more exciting life!

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Red Rubber Ball
programme.desc: Odessa loses her beloved rubber ball and learns how to deal with loss. Loss is part of life.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: The New Fred
programme.desc: After Fred clumsily insults Nora, he commands Friday to do his talking for him, transforming into a neck piece Fred wears, imitating his voice, and giving him a shock when he tries to speak for himself. Friday’s bold personality rehabilitates Fred’s reputation, until he short circuits and starts insulting everyone.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: Lost Lamp
programme.desc: Aladdin discovers his mother has sold the lamp for money. He rushes to the lamp sellers stall when Jamillah arrives, causing a mess everywhere. When Aladdin tells her that Genie has been sold she hatches a plan and dresses up as a noble woman with Aladdin as her servant in order to get him back. Whilst she distracts the lamp seller Aladdin tries to find Genie except theres one problem - there are hundreds of lamps! The lamp seller sees through their disguise and banishes them away but they return and manage to get the lamp only to have the Grand Vizier walk away with it. Jamillah tricks him by trading a pocket torch she has from home, getting the lamp back and saving Genie.

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: Detective Duda
programme.desc: Scot receives a special pair of underwear at his home. He puts it on and goes to sleep, excited to show it to his friends the next day. But when he wakes up, he discovers that he had a small accident. Afraid that his friends would make fun of him, he goes to dry his underwear, but the wind blows it away to Pinkar. Meanwhile, Dadas watch has disappeared. Duda plays detective and tries to solve the mystery. However, when the friends catch Scot on top of Pinkar, they jump to conclusions and accuse him of taking the watch. Scot, embarrassed to tell them the truth, runs away. Its up to Duda to get to the bottom of things. Will Detective Duda solve the case and save the day?

programme.title: A Question Of Smell – Jack & The Beanstalk
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of “Jack and the Beanstalk”, having been called out by Jack’s mother. Her son climbed up a giant beanstalk going from the garden up into the clouds, and has not returned. The fairytale detective and her assistant set off on the tracks of the missing boy and climb up into the strange world of the giants, above the clouds. There, they will pull off a great escape full of surprises, risks and adventures

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: Love Deodorant
programme.desc: With the school’s formal dance coming up, Fred insists Friday should be able to do something to find him a love potion so Nora will be attracted to him. Brains catches Friday trying to keep up the charade.

programme.title: Rat Control
programme.desc: It looks like don has come to terms with Charly, Marly and Larry ; and that is not it, they are now friends!!! Colonel just cannot stand this atrocity. He is hiring experts after experts to destroy the rats. And at last the right person comes for the job. Will he succeed..?? You wish!!!!!!

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: A Storm in the Desert
programme.desc: A huge sand storm is approaching Baghdad. Everyone has been ordered to stay indoors and baton down the hatches. Jamillah arrives to find Aladdin boarding up windows and sealing the cracks in the door. Genie desperately doesnt want the storm to come, he hates getting sand in his lamp! Luckily he has an ancient and very complicated spell which will stop it but it requires a number of ingredients including a hens feather and a single drop of water. Jamillah and Aladdin go outside to collect the special items but Aladdin becomes stuck under a cart. Genie and Jamillah have to work quickly to stop the storm and save Aladdin.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Friday finds a stray puppy, but its Fred and Brains who fall in love with it, paying more attention to the pooch than to him. When he starts to suspect the puppy of being more evil than he seems, they don’t believe him. Indeed, the puppy turns out to be a brilliant alien mastermind, intent on global domination.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: Knot My Problem
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting how to tie her shoes until Promi shows her a way to remember. Practice makes perfect, and perseverance leads to achievement.

programme.title: More Ways Than One
programme.desc: When Pancake cuts Maple’s toast differently than Mama does, it sends Maple into a tailspin. Then in the Zooniverse an art competition shows her that different can be good. There can be more than one way to do things, and each can be right.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: La ciega vidente
programme.desc: El destino vuelve a unir a Iván y Karina y él se da cuenta de que sus sentimientos no se han desvanecido.

programme.title: Horizontes del amor
programme.desc: Varya no cree en los hombres y cría sola a su hija, cuando Ilya aparece en su vida.

programme.desc: Varya no cree en los hombres y cría sola a su hija, cuando Ilya aparece en su vida.

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales 8
programme.desc: The Spooktacular series, Incredible Tales featuring the paranormal encounters of ordinary people, returns for an 8th installment.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.desc: Simón se ha perdido en el bosque buscando a sus padres, una pareja de gigantes.

programme.title: Los Pitufos - Carnaval De Otoño
programme.desc: Los Pitufos deben encontrar a una familia de conejos para tirar de su carroza durante el Festival de Otoño.

programme.title: La Abominable Bestia De La Nieve
programme.desc: Los Pitufos son pequeños y alegres seres azules. ¡Sigue sus aventuras más emocionantes y mágicas!

programme.title: Los Pitufos - Pitufo Tenor
programme.desc: Pitufo Armonía ya no es bienvenido en el coro de los Pitufos: canta de una manera demasiado desafinada.

programme.title: Los Pitufos - Paraíso Pitufo
programme.desc: Pitufo Perezoso sueña que está en la Isla Paraíso y libre de todo el trabajo que Papá Pitufo le impone.

programme.title: Los Pitufos - El Pitufo Falso
programme.desc: La malvada bruja se transforma en Pitufo para vengarse de ellos por destruir su amuleto mágico.

programme.title: Los Pitufos - Sassette Aprende A Leer
programme.desc: Pitufo Filósofo está horrorizado.

programme.title: El Cuerno De La Abundancia
programme.desc: Madre Naturaleza siempre da lo mejor de sí misma, pero esta vez algo ha salido mal.

programme.title: Los Pitufos - El Pituforobotín

There's a Noose Waiting for You
programme.desc: This sequel to the popular spaghetti western "Clint the Stranger" was released four years after the success of the first film and essentially uses the same plot. George Martin returns as Clint (renamed Trinity in some countries), an ex-gunslinger desperately wanting to be forgiven and accepted by his family that he abandoned years earlier. One major differences in the plot when compared to the first film is the addition of Klaus Kinski as a ruthless bounty hunter. The bounty hunter tracks Clint down and forces him to return to his violent ways to protect himself and his family.

programme.title: Django Defies Sartana
programme.desc: Django comes to town to discover that his brother Steve, accused of robbing a bank, has been lynched. Django believes the real culprit is Sartana and challenges him to a duel. Just in time he discovers that the author of the crime is an important local figure and Django and Sartana join forces to punish him.

programme.desc: A soldier, now a mercenary, has been brought to a foreign country by a former associate to aid in the security of that country's President. He escapes and joins the rebels to clear his name, and to expose the true person behind the President's assassination.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Established in 2019, Drunk Chicken Cigars (DC Cigars) are handmade in the U.S.A. to create premium flavor profiles. Every combination of tobacco leaf, including the filler, binder, and wrapper, was chosen to produce an assortment of smooth, rich, and savory cigars with a variety of customers in mind. Join Sean has he dicusses the mission of the DC Cigars family is to produce premium cigars that can be smoked anytime of the day.

programme.title: Cigar TV Original Documentaries

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, we‚Äôre joined once again by Dave Yancey, who brings along some fantastic bourbon pairings: Weller Antique 107, Larceny, and Knob Creek Rye. He also introduces a new tasting wheel designed for pairing any drink with cigars. I‚Äôm smoking a Buffalo Ten Connecticut while Dave enjoys a Tobacco Cabana House Criollo '99. My cigar‚Äôs mild profile lets me appreciate the bourbons without overpowering their flavors.

programme.title: Guest Brianna Arps
programme.desc: Join us for an inspiring conversation with Brianna Arps, the visionary founder and CEO of MOODEAUX, a fragrance label that's disrupting the industry with its authenticity and innovation. In this episode, Brianna shares her remarkable journey from beauty editor to entrepreneur, revealing how a job loss sparked her entrepreneurial spirit and led to the creation of MOODEAUX. Delving into her deep fascination with fragrance and the scientific intricacies that drive her passion, Brianna reflects on the challenges of entrepreneurship, including the importance of self-belief and continuous learning. Together, they explore the significance of black representation in the fragrance industry and Brianna's role in founding Black in Fragrance, a support network for black perfumers. Brianna also discusses her recent accomplishment of being one of Beauty Matter Next 2023 grant recipients, highlighting her commitment to driving innovation and diversity in the beauty industry. Get ready to be inspired by Brianna's unwavering determination, creativity, and commitment to building a brand that celebrates diversity and authenticity in the world of beauty and fragrance.

programme.title: Guest Eboni K. Williams
programme.desc: Eboni K. Williams is a lawyer, a broadcaster, a Real Housewife, a friend, and an amazing person. In this fascinating convo we talk about why she should not date a bus driver, what she’s looking for in a relationship, her future as a mother, and more.

programme.title: Guest October London
programme.desc: October London is a hot singer-songwriter who Snoop Dogg has installed as the new face of Death Row Records. London’s got an album out called the Rebirth of Marvin and another 75 albums in his hard drive. He’s an amazing talent who somehow made it out of Indiana and is now a superstar. We talk about making music by freestyling, loving his son, and how he doesn’t want to get married ever again. Amazing conversation with a singular musician.

programme.title: The Crew talks New Year Resolutions, Rihanna, the Super Bowl, and More
programme.desc: Starr Rocque and Yonathan Elias kick off the year sharing some of their goals and covering the hottest pop culture news, from the Grammys and the Oscars to Rihanna and the Super Bowl and everything in between.

programme.title: There Was A Killing
programme.desc: Regan Russell’s tragic death exposes the dark side of animal agriculture in this gripping film.

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Planting Roots
programme.desc: From garden to gourmet, join Cayley & Brandon Jenner as they unleash flavors of plant-based cooking.

programme.title: Meet the Chickens -Short Film
programme.desc: This short and uplifting film will change everything you thought you knew about chickens!

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Sister Rolls and Yoga Cakes
programme.desc: Spork Food's sisters make their Fresh Spring Rolls with Glazed Shiitake Mushrooms and Tangy Peanut Dipping Sauce! Yoga master, Andrew Sealy, cooks delicious Pancakes with a homemade Blueberry Syrup

programme.title: Redfoo's Party Farmhouse- Short film
programme.desc: Enter the California kitchen of LMFAO's Redfoo & his partner Jazzy! Watch them create magical food!

programme.title: The Wicked Kitchen-3 Mind Bending Mushrooms to Cook With
programme.desc: Three amazing mushrooms and the techniques used to cook them.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Superfood Pizza & Deviled "Eggs"
programme.desc: Deviled eggs that are completely plant-based and delish. Zero cholesterol. Watch and believe it!

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Olympian Bowl & Hollywood Truffle
programme.desc: Olympian medalist, Dotsie Bausch, makes her Superwoman vegan Bowl.

programme.title: Dear Diary
programme.desc: When a psychiatric doctor researches a young girls' diary to find out why she murdered her entire family, he begins to fall into the same state of insomnia and confusion that led her to lose her mind...

programme.title: Doctor Carver
programme.desc: A group of ladies seeking the perfect faces soon realise when they conjure a demonic plastic surgeon, that no surgery comes without a price...

programme.title: The Demon's Child
programme.desc: In search for her missing sister, a young woman takes a job as a nurse to a young boy in a coma and hunts for clues in his sinister family home...

programme.title: Juicios de Brujas
programme.desc: Dos realizadores de documentales y un ex policía investigan la desaparición de una niña que se rumorea que fue secuestrada por una bruja en los bosques encantados de Connecticut...

programme.title: Habitación Ouija
programme.desc: Una mujer agorafóbica con autismo comienza a invocar espíritus para que sean sus amigos mientras su hermano/cuidador está ausente durante el día, pero cuanto más tiempo pasa con los espíritus, más claro se vuelve que no son tan amigables después de todo...

programme.title: Serpiente
programme.desc: El equipo de construcción desarrolló a ciegas la isla desconocida, lo que alertó a las dos feroces criaturas de la isla para que fueran destruidas...

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: El cartel más poderoso ha puesto sus reglas y deben respetarse, la regla principal del patrón es prohibir los secuestros en la plaza. El comandante Ántrax es el encargado de hacer cumplir las órdenes del señor.

programme.title: El Basukazo 2
programme.desc: Después de haber sido dado por muerto, Edgar es rescatado por una bella mujer que trabaja en la mafia, cuando Edgar se recupera de sus heridas se integra al nuevo equipo ya que se necesita un hombre que sea experto en el manejo de las armas.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: Cena Para Tres
programme.desc: Diego regresa a México después de dictar cátedra de arquitectura en Madrid y se encuentra con su antiguo amor, Carmen. Planea una cena para dos para despedir el año. Carmen asume que esa noche Diego le pedirá matrimonio pero la llegada inesperada de Valentina (su novia española) y la revelación del pasado secreto de Carmen cambiarán el destino de los personajes.

programme.title: El Triunfo De Vivir
programme.desc: El Triunfo de Vivir. Rodrigo ha cumplido 12 años y su vida ha sido marcada por el dolor, accidentes y enfermedades. En una misteriosa fiesta reúne a 6 niños en su aventura por vencer enfermedades, impactantes accidentes y hasta el cáncer. Rodrigo en un hospital conoce al amor de su vida, sin imaginar quien sería, su vida cambiaría por completo transformando su existencia y la de millones de personas con un sólo objeto: "La Mentis"

programme.title: El Viaje De La Nonna
programme.desc: A la Nonna, abuela de los Todaro, se le olvida todo. Todo menos que quiere ir a la tierra de su amado y difunto marido, Italia, con toda su familia, antes de que también se le olvide que tiene familia. Acorralados por la insistencia de la Nonna y queriendo darle un último gusto, la familia decide concederle su añorado viaje. Así pues, todos se embarcan en una aventura en búsqueda de imágenes para la memoria de la abuela; en un viaje lleno de enredos y sorpresas inherentes a la situación, pero, sobre todo, de amor.

programme.title: La Mujer que Hablaba con Los Muertos
programme.desc: Es un film de Terror. Cuando Elena Castaño era una niña, tenía un don: era capaz de comunicarse con los espíritus de los muertos... pero esa capacidad desapareció al crecer. Ahora, Elena y su hermana Úrsula viven de las rentas del pasado, organizando falsas sesiones de espiritismo en las que embaucan a los incautos. Elena, harta de esa vida, ha decidido que esta noche celebrará su última sesión. Todo está dispuesto, solo que hay un invitado de más... un invitado al que nadie esperaba. A la hora de afrontar la historia, hemos tenido en cuenta miles de filias: desde los cuentos de fantasmas de M.R. James hasta "Diez Negritos”, de Agatha Christie, pasando por “Posesión Infernal”, “La Trama” (la de Hitchcock, claro) o “En Bandeja de Plata”, de Billy Wilder. La idea era hacer un largometraje con el que la gente se divierta pasando miedo. Que se rían justo antes de saltar del susto, para después volver a reírse.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: El Beso Inmortal: La Reina De La Noche
programme.desc: Las vacaciones italianas de dos universitarias chocan con un antiguo ritual. Pero a veces los rezos se convierten en cazadores.

programme.title: Distopia
programme.desc: Impulsados por antiguos planes esotéricos, poderosas elites ocultas emplean armas bioquímicas, guerra psicológica, cuarentenas mundiales, e incluso magia negra para controlar el futuro de la humanidad y alcanzar la inmortalidad
